column5: Don aka Tracker, Had a heart attack last Thursday. He is currently in the hospital in the ICU. When i get further details i will let everyone know his updated status.
terrible news I'll say a few words for him tonite.
Don's a tough bird... he'll be just fine with time.
sorry to hear that we will give him a few prayers and wait for further news.  Art
That DAMN DOG! Let me know Dann how things work out.
sorry to hear that, we are thinking of him
Wow, that't terrible news.  Please do keep us informed and give his family our thoughts and well wishes.  Get better Don!
Not good news at all. Lots of folks pulling for you, Don. Get yourself well soon.  Thanks for letting us know, Dann.

He's in good hands in the ICU. Having just seen how they were with my Dad, you can't ask for better care. Don and his family will be in my thoughts during this difficult time. Get better Don, plenty more fish to be caught.
Which Hospital is he in Dan? I know we can't go and see him right now but perhaps when he is out of ICU.  In the mean time, our thoughts and prayers are with him.
Not good news...but hopefully we will get some very soon......our prayers are with you.  Bob
Oh no!!  Please keep us updated Dann...I'm really hoping all will be ok!
sorry to hear that, any updates on how he is?  Maureen
